amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 115-39 to strengthen anonymity protections for employees filling out exit surveys, and requires exit survey data to be compiled at the VISN level to identify and acknowledge regional differences.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Herrera Beutler amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A010) offered by Ms. Herrera Beutler.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Ms. Herrera Beutler.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Herrera Beutler amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
